Name: Monopolka
About the game: Description Standard Monopoly Game. You need to become a market monopoly and have monetary superiority over other players. You can choose a 'Furry' characters of available and choose color. Сan improve your business to get more profit from them. Trade with other players to get more benefits. Main goal of the game - to remain the only player able to pay for visits to foreign companies. If you can not pay - you lose and waiting for the next round. Features 12 characters to choose from Throw dice as you like Simple interface 15 musical compositions: Koker 007 - Breath of Spring Koker 007 - Deep memory Koker 007 - Ektos Koker 007 - Farewell Forever Koker 007 - Highlight Koker 007 - Hyperspace jump through the event horizon Koker 007 - Pollen'o FF Koker 007 - Scatter Blue Koker 007 - Broken sight Koker 007 - Gliese 581 Koker 007 - Relaying Koker 007 - Sea smooth Koker 007 - 2012.01.16 v1.5 Koker 007 - 2012.09.08 v0.6 Koker 007 - 2013.02.08 v09 Can up to 10 players playing at one time Selection player color on slider Сonnection to the server from the list of steam friends or by ip 9 easy Steam Achievements Note: This is a multiplayer game, to start the game, need at least 2 players. The maximum can be 10. At the moment, you can connect to the server only by ip. Server must take care that port 1590 is opened.
